0000.author: Andre Agassi
0000.quote: Nothing can substitute for just plain hard work.

0001.author: Billie Jean King
0001.quote: One of the things it taught me is that every ball that comes to me, I have to make a decision.

0002.author: Rafael Nadal
0002.quote: Tennis is, more than most sports, a sport of the mind.

0003.author: Roger Federer
0003.quote: Tennis is a tough sport â€“ there are no draws.

0004.author: Goran Ivanisevic
0004.quote: I just try to play tennis and don't find excuses. You know, I just lost because I lost, not because my arm was sore.
